article_title: Blinken steps up call for Israel to spare civilians
sentence: Hamas  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October  killed  1,200  people  with  around  240  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: Blinken steps up call for Israel to spare civilians
sentence: Since  then,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  Israel  has  killed  more  than  14,800  Palestinians  in  its  retaliatory  campaign,  including  about  6,000  children.
